name: Caffeine-for-windows
tagline: Prevent Windows from hibernation and screensaving.
body:
### Caffeine for Windows is a lightweight utility for Windows written in Visual Basic.

***

## Futures
* Very Lightweight (543 KB)
* Runs In The Windows Traybar
* Configurable Timer (in minutes)

***


## Screenshots
